page.title: 05BRENTWOOD HOUSING SURVEY
page.content:
Our survey of houses in Brentwood showed the area to consist of a mixture of {Victorian}and{Modern} housing. Nearer to the{centre}of the town the houses are mainly from the Victorian period, about 120 years old, and further to the outskirts of the town they become more modern and slightly larger.
Also in the{suburbs}there are several modern estates of detached and semi-detached houses. Houses in the {inner suburbs}are terraced.Most of the shops we found in {Warley Hill}were old Victorian buildings.
As Brentwood expands some of the older houses are being pulled down and replaced by modern buildings but some older buildings are being renovated.
